cpu.description: The number of vCPUs that you want to reserve for each node of this kdb cluster on the scaling group host.

memoryLimit.description: An optional hard limit on the amount of memory a kdb cluster can use.

memoryReservation.description: A reservation of the minimum amount of memory that should be available on the scaling group for a kdb cluster to be successfully placed in a scaling group.

nodeCount.description: The number of kdb cluster nodes.

scalingGroupName.description: A unique identifier for the kdb scaling group.
